website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight cream that goes on smoothly and will keep your glam glitter going all evening.
pros: Helps prevent fallout by sealing loose glittery powder and shimmery shades without feeling gluey or heavy
Also works well for everyday makeup where extra hold is needed
cons: Some found the application of the primer and then the glitter required a bit of a learning curve

customer_reviews.title: Baller product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for chunky glitter to stay on my face. It worked perfectly and lasted through a night of sweating at a lady Gaga concert
customer_reviews.author: Kristynaustin18

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this!! Glitter is in high demand right now and you NEED this in your makeup collection
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Pannell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! My baby is a cheerleader and I got this for her makeup!! It looks amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Tymes

customer_reviews.title: All-day wear
customer_reviews.text: My third tube of this in as many years, even with nearly everyday use! I use it for keeping my regular eyeshadow in place for my 14+ hour days. Especially great if you are active/in a warm climate/oil-prone.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for beginners but not long lasting hold
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good glitter primer for beginners, definitely not the strongest hold. But it works for a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra HigdonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Keeps powered eyeshadow pigments exactly in place
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with powdered pigments to create cream eye shadow. It's designed to be put on before powder, but I find it works best mixing them together to make a cream. It keeps every last speck of powder in place all day. Fantastic sticking and longevity! It would be too thick/heavy to use under foundation, but this is great to keep eye makeup in place. It is a little tough to remove, I have to scrub with make up remover wipes, but hey, that's the price of keeping your makeup perfectly still all day. FYI- The primer is a light tan color, so it might mess up white eye shadow.
customer_reviews.author: SmolCat

customer_reviews.title: Held on great!
customer_reviews.text: This glitter glue is amazing! Held glitter on all night, but removed easily with makeup remover. Didn't irritate the skin, flake, or dis color our makeup. Put sliver glitter on our faces for a space party. Glue stuck to plain skin with foundation and powder makeup (blush and eyeshadow) on it as well as skin that had cream face paint on it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Sparkle Baby! Money Baby!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to do face and body glitter for pride, made lots of sales, my own makeup stayed on just fine from 11am to 8pm. It's a small bottle but I got a whole lot of bang for my buck! just when you done think you can squeeze anymore out of it you definately can! so happy with the product! worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: crystal lopez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Used it to dress up My slave and give him a glitter beard. he said it was easy to remove. It also held up really well, this picture was taken after Bassnectar360 and we all got very sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Indi

customer_reviews.title: What's too much glitter? Is there such a thing?
customer_reviews.text: Works great for dramatic glitter application. Be wholey invested in wanting glitter on your lids cause this stuff makes it stick really well and its hard to just put a little on. I love this stuff, theres no weird smell and it doesnt sting or burn when applied to lids. It also doesnt smear your eyeshadow if your applying it over a certain color you have on. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best glitter primer i’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb! I LOVE glitter and have tried a few other types of primers and they were “meh” at best. This primer holds all my fun loose glitter and makes my makeup looks complete and sparkly! Not only does it hold my gorgeous glitter, but it holds it well! I can go out dancing and sweating and my glitter stays put AND I don’t have to scrub my delicate skin to get it off when I want it off. A simple facial oil and it comes right off!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Really helped me out
customer_reviews.text: People rave about colourpop glitters, saying you dont need glitter glue but that was not my experience. Day one, glitter all over my face and I could barely pack the color on the lid so I got this because I cant return the custom pallet and they work as I hoped now. It sticks to the lid and stays. Getting it off is an issue but thats the glitters issue not this. It comes off the lids but all over the face. dang it glitters! LOVE HATE
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Best glitter glue ever!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of people buying this so I had to try it out , and I actually really like it . It's easy to apply , and the glitter really sticks! Plus when you want to take it off it's not hard at all. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: lillie garcia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. I use a lot of glitter and shimmers on my eyes and for my clients. This hold so well, but is a pain to get off. If you try to remove it with anything but face wash, it gets everywhere and all around your eye gets sticky. But, it does what it's meant to do. It's also not sticky once you have glitter or something on your eyelid. I will continue to repurchase this.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for eyeshadow and foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, especially as a foundation primer! Great for summer months when you sweat a ton. Just put a thin layer on as a primer and you’re good to go! A little goes a long way... which is good because this only comes in a tiny size (think size of chapstick or smaller. But definitely a go-to for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cherylann Bellavia

customer_reviews.title: Good price but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I like that is like a creamy application and doesn't sting or irritate the skin like many glitter primers, but it's not very effective at holding the glitter or staying put and it doesn't distribute well. The glitter applies in patches and chunks rather than spread out or dusted across the skin for a clean look. I have yet to find the left glitter primer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Wow! For more than just glitter, use for any loose pigment. Locks it in place!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! All I can say is, this is the BEST glitter or pigment primer there is. I have used several more expensive ones, this outperforms them all. If you plan on using any kind of loose glitter, this is a MUST. You can use it for any loose eyeshadow, not just glitter. It basically makes any powder eyeshadow into a smudge proof cream eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: It did it's job
customer_reviews.text: Kept all kinds of glitter on my face the entire night on multiple nights for Halloween fun...
customer_reviews.author: EMGee

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Was excited trying this out at first, the price seemed reasonable, when it come to applying the glitter glue I really had to use a lot to get the glitter to stick, I mean layering it on! The glue seemed to take a while to dry too. An hour in I could feel the glue loosing its strength as additional glitter and small gems began to fall off.. I wasn’t impressed but after reapplying various times it seemed to hold through an evening at home. I would avoid this product as I’m pretty sure I’ve tried better but it might become useful as a back up!
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: It went on easily, did not irritate my skin and didn't feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used many other glitter primers hence not giving it 5 stars since I have nothing to compare it to. It went on easily, did not irritate my skin and didn't feel gunky or cakey. Wore it for several hours and everything stayed on for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan R

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help perfect my glitter cut crease and I'm not impressed. Maybe I'm not using it right, but I still ended up with glitter transfer on my upper eyelid. I'm going to try using a setting spray after and see if that helps but with having to do that, I might as well just go back to using concealer only. It did arrive safely, as described and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: a must buy for eye shadow and eye liners !!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on a whim - and so happy that I did. I have tried all of the BEST so called eye shadow and eyeliner primers and none of them work as well as this does.-Read on this site that this products works for glitter application, but also saw that some people use if for eye shadow and eyeliner - Well, it works really good - and finally my eye makeup stays on all day. ! YEAH !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jewel1000

customer_reviews.title: I can’t believe it worked as a face primer when you’re in a pinch and run out of your face primer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly good primer. I wasn't expecting much due to the price. I usually use it just for my eyes but I was out of primer for my makeup today and used this. It worked under my makeup! It is sticky, that’s the point I guess. So I finished with powder and Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray and voila! It’s good for when you are in a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Shawn Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: No creasing & long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This primer doesn’t crease, isn’t sticky, and gets the job done all day (and all night) long! You can follow me on Instagram to see some of my makeup looks & the other items I have reviewed 💓 @theehaleybee
customer_reviews.author: Haley bee

customer_reviews.title: glitter glue
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome at keeping glitter on your face a little bit of glitter came of during the night but nothing to scream about this stuff is awesome
customer_reviews.author: lastarza

customer_reviews.title: METALLIC SHINY PACKAGING COUNT ME IN
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way this product gripped my glitter eyeshadow. It make it really shiny! I love the packaging that it comes with and the way it’s so metallic on the box. I was so happy to find a good eyeshadow primer for glitter. I highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicole Sosa

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: mix this with concealer and you have an everyday eyeprimer works great with glitter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Glitter Glue Primer!
customer_reviews.text: This glitter primer is better than the high end primer I’ve used. I can’t believe the price! Authentic and amazing. You can even use this on shimmer shadows to make them pop!
customer_reviews.author: MouthyMama

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and easy to remove.
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect. I have used it for eyeshadow looks and just basic face glitter. Lasts a long time, perfect for long day use. Great hold, none of the glitter flaked off. And super easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: 🦇🖤ellen🖤🦇

customer_reviews.title: A little goes along ways
customer_reviews.text: I love the sheer cover thst this product gives when placing it on your eyes. Ive learned with this *a little goes a long ways* so keep that in mind. Holds perfectly for a all day look. Have not had any problems with creasing up only when i use too much. Also, my prefernce i found worked best for me was patting my glitters using only my finger.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work Well
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for initially putting on glitter eye shadow. However, the glue does not hold glitter in place for more than 20 minutes. My glitter creases almost immediately and is gone by the end of the day. I do not touch my eyes and know how to use makeup. Unfortunately, this product is not your best bet for eyeshadow glitter. I recommend using an eye primer instead.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Its like superglue and it worked with my everyday glitter look. my foundation smears when i try to spread this, but it may just be my foundation or my brush. i think it happens cuz its so strong. As far as sticking glitter to the face, it works :)
customer_reviews.author: fsdgsdfgsh

customer_reviews.title: Samples
customer_reviews.text: am a dedicated fan of your company because I love the way that you combine such pure techniques with science to create wonderful skincare products! I absolutely adore your products because they always deliver what I need, whether it is to give my skin more vitality or to cleanse. I would love to try some products out before I buy, to see which work best on me and which I love using. Could you please send me some samples from your makeup or skincare products ranges? I would be so grateful if you could. I would be very happy with any samples at all. Thank you! I am looking forward to trying them out! Yours faithfully,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. I tried this to keep glitter on my lips and it didn't work at all. The glitter was not even adhering to my lips. So i went on youtube and watched some videos. Fake eyelash glue worked 100% better than this stuff. The eyelash glue actually held the glitter to my lips and lasted all night. don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: audrey sanabria

customer_reviews.title: It works wonders
customer_reviews.text: The glue isn’t clear but nude color. A little goes a long way to keep large glitters on my face. I also used it on my folds for fine glitter. Unfortunately some still fell to my cheeks from eye movements (not as much as not using this primer). When I put fine glitter on lids, it didn’t scatter.
customer_reviews.author: Anony MouseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make a difference
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this after reading the good reviews that said it could be used with regular shadow. But, as you can see by my picture, my shimmery eyeshadow started creasing about 6 hours into the day. Also it made the eyeshadow patchy to begin with. My search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay product. Nothing to get excited over. I will say though, when it comes on to chunky glitter it tends to not hold it in place for a very long time. I'm a makeup psycho. I love trying new products so I'm not mad about this product. I'm gonna continue to use and see if I'll like it a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Starfire

customer_reviews.title: Got confused 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I got confused with another product I ordered somewhere else I edited my review 5/5 SORRY about that. Good product fast arrival and it's okay size is very small but it's ok for the price I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Cecy ZO

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I use this on my eyelids and face to get super sparkly for dancing with my Mardi Gras dance crew. The glitter sticks and stays put all night, even with lots of sweaty activity. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: NOLA Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: More of a glue than a primer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this accidentally for an eyeshadow primer. Actually, I thought it would work for both shadow and glittery sparkles, but it’s not. It stays tacky, and smells like false eyelash glue so until NewYears rolls around it will stay in my makeup drawer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to.
customer_reviews.text: It is better than some others I have tried. A little goes a long way. I have only used it to secure some rather "chunky" shimmers so far, but I can't see glitter being a problem for this product.
customer_reviews.author: freedom girl

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: First time using it I really loved it I did a lil with chunky eye glitter and fell asleep with the makeup on and my glitter was still in tact Ready to wash off doesn’t get hard or crust over I’m very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Love It For Festival Glitter!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to put glitter on my face for a festival and it kept the glitter on all day and night. I have sensitive skin but it didn’t leave a rash or feel uncomfortable at all. Honestly felt better on the skin than some primers I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the BEST eyeshadow primer i have ever had. I have like 9 of them around my house so that i never run out if god forbid it discontinues or i run out. You losers are just lucky they put a limit on how many you can buy otherwise i would of gotten wayyyyy more than 3 and there would be none left for the rest of you 😜😜😜😜
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: Glitter primer
customer_reviews.text: Mainly used for pressed eyeshadow. Goes on easily. Only need a little bit. Eyeshadow or lips look fabulous and stays for hours. Highly recommend. Next time I will buy several at a time for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: A must have for glitter
customer_reviews.text: Nice consistency, not too thick. Dries down fairly quickly, and most importantly it lasts! First time I wore this with some loose glitter on a night out. My eye look stayed immaculate. Easy to remove with a makeup wipe.
customer_reviews.author: adrian arenas

customer_reviews.title: Great glitter glue.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use glitter glue, and lasts quite awhile. It doesn't have the staying power such as Ben Nye glitter glue might have, but for simple eye looks it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Baxter

customer_reviews.title: YES YES YES
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. My glitter shadow doesn't budge and there isn't any glitter fallout!
customer_reviews.author: Janae Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: I normally use "Lit Cosmetics" and I must admit I was impressed by this NYX adhesive, it holds well and is lightweight. My only complaint is that in some places the glitter didn't seem hold well which caused it to look patchy but I used the "Lit Cosmetics" liquid adhesive over the patches and it worked well over the NYX. Long story short, yes I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Oya

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t use for intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I learned a hack from a friend to use this product on my eyebrows to make it last longer when makeup is applied so I wouldn’t experience and run and I must say, it exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Life With C

customer_reviews.title: Any eye shadow makes ur eyes pop with this underneath
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying this. Love the way it goes on and works. Definite difference with eye shadow when on
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ann Russo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: If you work with glitter in your makeup routine, this is a must-have! I tried to used a pressed glitter palette without this and by the end of my day, it was everywhere! But with this, wherever I put it the glitter doesn't move from that spot and stays high impact. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I use nyx glitter primer everyday to hold my glitter/shimmer in place all day never smudges or creases. It is by far the best glitter glue on the market. Bonus the tube lasts me about 2 months with everyday use. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glitter glue!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to do a skull makeup for Purim and it is the best! My glitter stayed up all night. about 9 hours after applying everything, it still looked good as new. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible glue. By the end of the night. Glitter was everywhere except on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Nieto

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: This actually works very well! I used this under the gem decals for your face, and it definitely helped with the longevity of the adhesion. It's also easy to remove; I did not have any problems when it was time to wash my face/body.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: I use it but it’s not my all time favorite
customer_reviews.text: Has a shimmer/iridescence to it but doesn’t over power whatever shadow or other glitter you place on top. Doesn’t ever feel like it completely dries and tends to end up in the crease of the eye after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: NerdyTurtle

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works well when I need an extra help with really course glitter. Wouldn't recommend for pressed glitter or glittery pigments, but works great with straight glitter makeups.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Davis

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: This thing gave me life. I marched, danced and sweated all thru carnival and this kept my make up and glitter in ✅. I liked it so much I’m using it every day now regular make up. Because my liner in check as well as my lipstick—-highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: AGV

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must buy if you’re into glitter makeup. I used this primer prior to adding my glitter and it held so well! During Mardi Gras season, glitter is a must!!! The primer helps with application and it holds for hours (overnight in my case).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to get the Ben Nye glitter glue but ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get the Ben Nye glitter glue but it wasn't eligible for Prime so I went with this. It does not work. At all. The glitter doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received in the mail today. Never tried it before snd I have been wanting something to make my Moondust eyeshadow to sparkle. OMG I tried it and it is AMAZING!!! I tried one eye with and one without. I used only 2 swipes on each eye and you can see the HUGE DIFFERENCE! I'm so impressed! Definitely going to use more!
customer_reviews.author: Emelyne Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A must for glittery eye looks
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It did not irritate my sensitive skin, kept chunky glitter in place all night, and was easy to remove. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cait R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. Keeps the eyeshadow on and vibrant for hours. Also if you rub it, it holds pretty good. I recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene

customer_reviews.title: No greasy look
customer_reviews.text: Girl! Yes! I love love love this glue. It’s sticks so well and it doesn’t look greasy. Ya know like it can leave a crease sometimes? Well it doesn’t! It’s easily removed with a make up remover. Will be purchasing Again
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used this to go to EF & it worked amazingly. My face glitter stayed on really well despite the afternoons being pretty hot & with all the walking/dancing around. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: ashes2ashes_dust2dust

customer_reviews.title: Amaze balls!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap this is great for eyeshadow in general. It really give you a deep color . It’s great for 4$ . It’s a deal for sureee!!
customer_reviews.author: Fantasia

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s purpose so I gave it 5 stars. But I would rather just put glitter on eyelids without it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Ive heard alot about this product, but I am just now being able to try it. I'm glad i did! I have not been able to find a glitter primer as great as this one! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Smoot

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for loose glitter holds it in place and lasts a long time so far the best I have found
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought specifically for one night, one occasion. Used on eyelids for glitter eyeshadow. Lasted all night. No fallout. Easy to apply. No issues or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best primer to make your glitter shadows really pop and stay on all day long without creasing or fading. You can't beat it for the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Engle

customer_reviews.title: no it doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: don't waste your time. Your better using eyelash glue or latex than this crap that doesn't work and black...
customer_reviews.author: Catherine, Impress of Z Internet

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done easily!
customer_reviews.text: Does its job for a great price. Glitter stayed on my students and my face all day, and I teach elementary. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: La'nee

customer_reviews.title: Burned my face!
customer_reviews.text: Wife review: Bought this with some glitter to put on my face for a bachelorette - IMMEDIATELY started burning my face when I put it on and I do not have sensitive skin. Do Not Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Bo

customer_reviews.title: It STICKS
customer_reviews.text: Super sticking power. Dries clear, only need a little as it spreads a great deal. Came off with soap and water easily. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BarneyBeautiful

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: NYX is a great brand but I was a little hesitant to buy this. I have used glitter on makeup before and it usually lasts about 4 hours and then it starts coming off. This was incredible kept it on all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Palacio

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I will admit, I was somewhat a skeptic of this product because it is NYX, but I was wrong! Works incredibly well. Glitter sticks and stays well, and it comes off easily when removed with a facial cleanser. A lot of product comes in the tube, and it is well worth the price. All around, very worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: I Highly recommend this Glitter Primer!
customer_reviews.text: Cool Product! Not too sticky but does the job as it holds the glitter in place. Doesnt smell! Didn't irratate my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It really really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the product I’ve been waiting my whole life for! Mardi Gras performing demands glitter and sweat. This stuff held up to both!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Duuuuuude!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely amazing! I used it with my loose glitter, and it held perfectly! No flaking off or cracking. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Yayyyyyy so good
customer_reviews.text: It helps glitter pigment stay in place with no fall out I am shook I love this product so excited for my upcoming looks
customer_reviews.author: trisha Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this primer and it really worked to hold my glitter in place. I didn't notice any fallout. I kind of have sensitive eyes but I didn't experience any irritation from using the NYX primer. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glue for loose glitter. I have oily eyelids and this glue has kept glitter on for over 8 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Andiiee

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.
customer_reviews.text: Its nice but not the best. Just ended up buying something else and keeping this one as emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalia Morales

customer_reviews.title: Best Primer Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Primer I have ever used. ALL the glitter stayed on for then length of an entire day
customer_reviews.author: Cee Starrz

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Has amazing staying power, especially since my eyelids tend to be oily.
customer_reviews.author: Lapin Moon

customer_reviews.title: Lasts and lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I used this with Unicorn Chunky Glitter, KARIZMA BEAUTY and it was wonderful! Held the glitter all day, and was easy to remove with a damp washcloth. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really sticky
customer_reviews.text: It is really sticky until it dries and it takes awhile to dry. Also it doesn't have much glitter at all.
customer_reviews.author: justablonde2000

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!! It’s amazing worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never use anything else to hold my glitter this primer acts like a glitter jel and it also brightens up the glitter as well?
customer_reviews.author: Tam Dollz

customer_reviews.title: Long time favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for any satin, sparkle, or metalic shades as well as glitter. It really makes it pop and it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Laura

customer_reviews.title: Must have...
customer_reviews.text: This producto is really really good!!! You must have it if you are a women crazy for makeup like me!! 😃
customer_reviews.author: Paola R.

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: three people used one tube for edc for all three days and we still had some left over! still messy for cleanup but it's glitter so not much you can do about it
customer_reviews.author: corra

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: The coverage is awesome. The glitter sticks well with little to no fallout. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well! Used it on my cheek bones, above my eyebrows, and on the inside of my eyes to wear chunky glitter for a 6 hour long rave, and the glitter barley moved through dancing and sweating. Comes off pretty easily with a baby wipe but you have to rub at it a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica96

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for glitter!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use with my glitter eye shadow and it is perfect!! Glitter stays on all night. I highly recommend this and will buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works really good the glitter stays all day on my eyes and face.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Strang

customer_reviews.title: Great for all but larger glitter
customer_reviews.text: Really works well with smaller glitter but large glitter does not adhere as well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R.

customer_reviews.title: Glitter?
customer_reviews.text: Nothing glittery about this. Not even shiny. I don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: gumboheads

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with pressed glitter shadow palettes! Absolutely necessary and a great product for its value! Love this stuff. 💕
customer_reviews.author: Che

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Glitter Primer Face Makeup
product_meta.description: Minimize glitter fallout and keep each and every sparkle in its place with our new Glitter Primer - a light and creamy formula that sets and then holds on tight to our Face & Body Glitter.
feature_bullets: GLITTER PRIMER: Maximize glitter impact & keep every sparkle in its place with our Glitter Primer, a light & creamy formula that sets & holds on tight to keep our Face & Body Glitters exactly where you want them.
ADD INSTANT SPARKLE THAT STAYS: This primer instantly preps skin to hold face and body glitter in place minimizing fallout and maximizing sparkle and style.

FACE FROM FOUNDATION TO FINISH: Complete your makeup look with our full line of NYX Professional Makeup face products to aid in color-correction & coverage from blush, bronzer, foundations & contouring concealer to palettes powders & setting sprays.
CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is PETA certified cruelty-free. We don't test any of our products on animals.

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all of our professional makeup & beauty products today, from eyeshadow, eyeliner, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, brushes & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
